verses.1: A thukkik Pasian, a thukkik Pasian, Topa aw, na hehna hong lak khia in.
verses.2: Tho in, leitung thukhen pa aw, a kiphasak mite tungah amauʼ ngah ding a kilawm gimna pia ta in.
verses.3: Topa aw, migilote bang tanvei lungdam ding uh a, migilote bang tanvei lungnuamin omom lai ding ahi uh hiam?
verses.4: Gamtat siate bang tanvei kihisak lai ding uh a, a siat gamtatna uh bang tanvei kisialh pih lai ding ahi uh hiam?
verses.5: Topa aw, amaute in nangma mite su gawp uh a, nangma luahte gimsak uh hi.
verses.6: Amaute in meigong numeite le khual mite that lumin pa nei lote suam lum uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute in, “ Topa in mu lo hi; Jakob Pasian in thei lo hi,” hong ci uh hi.
verses.8: Thei tel un, mi lungsimmawl pente aw! Lung pil lote aw, cik ciangin pil ding na hi uh hiam?
verses.9: I bil a bawlpa in khua za lo ding ahi hiam? I mit a piangsak pa in khua mu lo ding ahi hiam?
verses.10: Minamte a thuhilhpa in mi thuhilh lo ding ahi hiam? Mihingte tungah theihtheihna a hilh Topa in mihingteʼ ngaihsutna thei a, amaute pen husan bang bek ahihna teltakin a thei hi.
verses.12: Topa aw, migilote adingin gum khat a kitawh hun mateng, haksat hun sungteng a tawlngak theih nadingin na thukham na hilh mi, na thuhilh mi, mi nuamsa ahi hi.
verses.14: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama mite nusia lo dinga, ama luahte paidak lo ding hi.
verses.15: Bang hang hiam cih leh thutang pen thuman mite tungah hong tungkik dinga, lungsim thutang khempeuh in amah zui ding uh hi.
verses.16: Kei adingin migilote a do dingin kua kipan ahi hiam? Kei adingin siatna a bawlteʼ lang khat ah kua ding ahi hiam?
verses.17: Topa in kei hong huh lo hileh, gam khing sungah ka tung khinta ding hi.
verses.18: Topa aw, “Ka khe taal,” ci-in ka ngaihsut ciangin na itna kip in kei hong kai to hi.
verses.19: Ka lungsim ngaihsutna a tam mahmah ciangin kei na hong hehnem a, na hong lungdamsak hi.
verses.20: Sih nading ngeina a bawl, a gilo gam ukte, nang tawh kipawl ding ahi hiam?
verses.21: Amaute in thuman mihoihte thah sawm uh a, a mawhbaang lo mite sihna thuaksak uh hi.
verses.22: Ahih hangin Topa pen keima munkip, keima Pasian, ka belh suangpi a suak khinta hi.
verses.23: Amah in amauʼ mawhnate amauʼ tung mahah tungsakkikin, a gitlohna hangun amaute a maimangsak ding hi. Topa, i Pasian in amaute maimangsak ding hi.
